description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8oif2","text":"Protocol for loading syringes with small amounts of liquid sample for injection into droplet microfluidic devices. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ch1fd","text":"Take out a syringe ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8i4s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cprte","text":"Add 27g needle to the syringe","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3h4lc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"17l0l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"BD Biosciences","can_edit":1,"file":null,"guid":"452B4629341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","image":null,"link":null,"name":"Luer Lok Syringe (1mL)","sku":"309628","specifications":null,"type":"","vendor":{"affiliation":null,"affiliations":[],"badges":[],"blocked_by_you":false,"blocked_you":false,"hide_following":false,"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"is_verified_user":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)","note":null,"research_interests":null,"username":null,"verified":0}}},"1":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"BD","can_edit":1,"file":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"guid":"452B4672341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","image":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"link":null,"name":"Precisionglide Needle","sku":"301629","specifications":null,"type":null,"vendor":{"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"11o67","text":"Use the needle and syringe to draw out approximately   of   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"8D30A6CB224D11ED9F1D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","can_edit":1,"cas_number":"297730-93-9","error":false,"guid":"4373B933341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","label":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"HFE 7500 Perfluorinated Oil","public":0,"rrid":"","scientificNotation":false,"sku":null,"stats":{"total_protocols":0},"unit":1,"url":null,"vendor":{"affiliation":null,"affiliations":[],"badges":[],"blocked_by_you":false,"blocked_you":false,"hide_following":false,"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/vendors/1.png","source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/vendors/1.png"},"is_requested":false,"is_verified_user":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)","note":null,"research_interests":null,"username":null,"verified":0}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8k69k","text":"Cut approximately 20 centimeters of   with a razor and attach it to the needle tip. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2h51b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"92k5b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpblb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41982EA4341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"PE tubing ","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"BB31695-PE/2","stats":{"total_protocols":1},"url":"","vendor":{"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)"}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ebos7","text":"Cutting the tubing at an angle makes for easier insertion into microfluidic device downstream","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"el7aj","text":"Push the syringe so that the HFE7500 oil starts dripping at end of the tubing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d47oe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3ktb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"25fkc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":54,"offset":83,"style":"bold"}],"key":"45ah","text":"Make sure to keep the syringe pointed up so that the air leaves the syringe first. There must be no air bubbles in the syringe or needle.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ause","text":"Put the tube into the solution that you would like to load, and slowly draw the syringe to pull the solution into the tubing and syringe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a91m4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"336au","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":24,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"aeep","text":"Keep the syringe upright the whole time so that the oil remains on the bottom of the syringe.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":31,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"91l74","text":"Ensure there are no air bubbles in the tubing - if there are, push syringe to clear the air bubbles then pull to draw again.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0lbt","text":"Attach the loaded syringes to the syringe pumps ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajg2j","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9epui","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9m7rg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ft9k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1b77q","text":"You may have to keep the syringe pump and syringe upright to keep the oil on the bottom and the solution on top. *This is only necessary for large volumes of sample solution*","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"New Era Pump Systems, Inc.","can_edit":0,"file":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"guid":"4527600B341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","image":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"link":"https://www.syringepump.com/NE-300.php","name":"NE-300 Just Infusion™ Syringe Pump","sku":"NE-300","specifications":null,"type":"Automatic syringe pump","vendor":{"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cnra3","text":"Insert the other end of the tubing into the appropriate hole in the microfluidic device, using a tweezer or by hand.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"spce","text":"Set the appropriate syringe diameter and pump rates into the syringe pump and press start. You may want to begin the pumps with a higher pump rate in order to get the syringes to pressurize more quickly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
